trans-unit.source: Remove existing constraints for the selected order operations.

seg-source.mrk: Remove existing constraints for the selected order operations.

target.mrk: 移除所选订单工序的现有约束。

trans-unit.source: Remove existing date constraints for the selected order operations. You can remove constraints for order operations that are not yet in process.

seg-source.mrk: Remove existing date constraints for the selected order operations.
You can remove constraints for order operations that are not yet in process.

target.mrk: 移除所选订单工序的现有日期约束。
您可以移除尚未处理的订单工序的约束。

trans-unit.source: Enable the display of relationships and <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraints for operations in the settings (<sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/><sap-icon-font-color/><sap-icon-background-color/><sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character><sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font>).

seg-source.mrk: Enable the display of relationships and <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraints for operations in the settings (<sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/><sap-icon-font-color/><sap-icon-background-color/><sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character><sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font>).

target.mrk: 在设置 (<sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/><sap-icon-font-color/><sap-icon-background-color/><sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character><sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font-description></sap-icon-font>) 中为工序的关系和<uicontrol>必须开始于</uicontrol>约束启用显示。

trans-unit.source: This option can be useful in the following cases, for example:

seg-source.mrk: This option can be useful in the following cases, for example:

target.mrk: 在如下情况中，此选项非常有用：

trans-unit.source: You've canceled the dispatch of an order operation. You now want to remove the <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraint that was set automatically when the operation was dispatched.

seg-source.mrk: You've canceled the dispatch of an order operation.
You now want to remove the <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraint that was set automatically when the operation was dispatched.

target.mrk: 您已取消订单工序的分派。
您现在想要移除在分派工序时自动设置的<uicontrol>必须开始于</uicontrol>约束。

trans-unit.source: You've set a new start date for an order operation that has a successor operation. Due to an existing <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraint, the app can't adjust the dates of the successor operation. Once you remove the constraint for the successor operation, the operation can be rescheduled automatically.

seg-source.mrk: You've set a new start date for an order operation that has a successor operation.
Due to an existing <uicontrol>Must start on</uicontrol> constraint, the app can't adjust the dates of the successor operation.
Once you remove the constraint for the successor operation, the operation can be rescheduled automatically.

target.mrk: 已为具有后继工序的订单工序设置新的开始日期。
由于现有<uicontrol>必须开始日期</uicontrol>约束，因此应用无法调整后继工序的日期。
移除后继工序的约束后，可以自动重新计划工序。

trans-unit.source: The successor's dates are adjusted automatically if both operations are included in the same maintenance order. If you've created a cross-order relationship, you must trigger order scheduling manually to have the operation dates adjusted.

seg-source.mrk: The successor's dates are adjusted automatically if both operations are included in the same maintenance order.
If you've created a cross-order relationship, you must trigger order scheduling manually to have the operation dates adjusted.

target.mrk: 如果两个工序都包含在同一维护订单中，则将自动调整后继日期。
如果已创建跨订单关系，则必须手动触发订单计划以调整工序日期。
